parameters.description: A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service: see the [Web API Authorization Guide](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization-guide/) for details.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description:
An [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) or the string `from_token`. Provide this parameter if you want to apply [Track
Relinking](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/track-relinking-guide/).
parameters.name: market
